channel.title: [REQ] Site banner and over all style
channel.description:
hey there, well im remaking one of my sites to actually get it up this time :P and im in need of a banner here is some things im after in it.
Size, 955 x 242 BG colour, 1a1a1a some kind of red in it (Red X for the X in Xtremetutorials) White Text saying, "Xtremetutorials.co.uk" (with out the X at the start since that will be the "logo") Font, open i has some script that went nice im my last one [http://www.xtremetutorials.co.uk/i/header.jpg] but ill leave it up to you.. the X at the start im after something that represents Xtreme, full of energy, pops out at you gives a strong impression. some examples i like (but i don't want to rip)
http://www.xtremeathletes.us/db1/00037/xtremeathletes.us/_uimages/XTREME23d.jpg http://www.monteaglechamber.com/Xtreme%20Logo.JPG http://www.debraireland.org/images/XtremeLogo.jpg
some i saw on the inet 2day
small description of what im after, im after a modern logo in the banner that has some good style pops out, represents the name well, you may look at it and go "hey that is Xtreme" also if you have time what ever a logo (on any size) that can be used in other images could be nice.
im open to colours it dosent have to be what i said (since the site could do with a re colour since it is dark) i would like the images in .jpg and a copy of the .psd please
Thanks ~ N00b1

item.title: [REQ] Site banner and over all style
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

N00b1:

meh its all good… ill make something up :P[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2008, 02:41:26 pm[/size][hr]btw what font did ya use you got a link?

Avant Garde, look for it @ Thepiratebay
